channel.title: spring-cloud-tencent on Spring Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in spring-cloud-tencent on Spring Cloud

item.title: Tencent officially opens source Spring Cloud Tencent, creating a one-stop microservices solution
item.description: Recently, Spring Cloud Tencent was officially open sourced on June 14, as Tencent’s open source one-stop microservice framework, Spring Cloud Tencent implements Spring Cloud standard microservice SPI, developers can quickly develop Spring Cloud microservice architecture applications based on Spring Cloud Tencent. As Tencent’s open source one-stop microservice framework, Spring Cloud Tencent implements the Spring Cloud standard microservice SPI, which allows developers to quickly develop Spring Cloud microservice architecture applications based on Spring Cloud Tencent.
